article_title: Marathon Missouri filibuster follows a tradition that includes catheters, running shoes and Toby Keith lyrics
article_text:
A filibuster staged by Missouri Democrats in Jefferson City lasted a whopping 39 hours

Filibusters are a game of endurance and stamina

Some lawmakers have used catheters and running shoes for their marathon talkathons

article_metadata.news-keywords: Missouri, filibuster, Wendy Davis, Strom Thurmond, Rand Paul, Ted Cruz
